<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>unconnected_category_content</collection> <condition>(current.content_type == '4c32a92153622010069addeeff7b12a3') && GlidePluginManager.isActive("com.snc.knowledge_advanced")</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Delete older versions of KB articles</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var gr = new GlideRecord("unconnected_category_content"); gr.addEncodedQuery("sys_id!=" + current.sys_id.toString() + "^knowledge.number=" + current.knowledge.number.toString() + "^topic=" + current.topic.toString()); gr.query(); gr.deleteMultiple();
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-10-06 19:54:42</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>2cbefffa77961110cd1b756f1b5a9920</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete older versions of KB articles</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Content Taxonomy" source="com.snc.taxonomy">0dbb74a43c35311068bcf327dfe37ffd</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2cbefffa77961110cd1b756f1b5a9920</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-10-06 20:11:30</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2cbefffa77961110cd1b756f1b5a9920"/> </record_update>
